attributes.action: deny abusive partner access to children following split
attributes.additional_details: A Father or Mother who has been abusive to their partner should have their parental rights and responsibilities removed and any future access to  the child/children denied when the abused partner has left the family home or evicted the abusive partner. Provided it can be proven he or she has been abusive to their ex-partner. This would remove the risk of any child being abused at the hand of the abusive parent.
